component.name: GitHub Store
component.summary: An app store for GitHub releases

description.p: Github Store is an app store for GitHub releases that helps you discover and install apps directly from GitHub repositories. The app automatically discovers repositories that ship installable binaries (APK, EXE, DMG, etc.) and lets you install the latest release with one click.

ul.li: Smart discovery with Popular, Recently Updated, and New sections
Platform-aware filtering - only shows apps compatible with your device
Always installs from the latest published release
Rich app details with README, changelog, and statistics
GitHub login support for higher API rate limits
Material 3 design with dark mode support

description.p: Built with Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform.
